text.text_translated:
Asteroids are big rocks in space.
Now, NASA is looking for smaller asteroids.
They are looking for asteroids that are 140 metres wide or more.
People think there are about 25,000 of these asteroids.
Until now, NASA found about 8,000.
So, they still need to find 17,000.
This is very important.
In 2013, a small asteroid exploded over a city in Russia.
It was only 19 metres wide.
But it hurt 1,200 people.
So, these bigger asteroids are a serious danger.
They are a big problem if they come near our world.
